school.name: Mar Baselios Public School
school.vision: To nurture morally upright, intellectually competent, socially committed, and spiritually inspired individuals who contribute positively to society.
school.mission: To offer holistic education in a safe, inclusive, and innovative environment, enabling students to realize their full potential.

about.overview: Mar Baselios Public School is a leading CBSE-affiliated institution under the management of the Mar Baselios Educational and Charitable Society. The school aims to provide a blend of academic excellence, character formation, and modern learning experiences. It emphasizes values, discipline, creativity, and life-oriented education.

infrastructure.campus: Spacious eco-friendly campus with smart classrooms and CCTV security.
infrastructure.library: A digital library with over 10,000 books, journals, and e-learning resources.

labs.science_lab: Equipped with modern apparatus for Physics, Chemistry, and Biology practicals.
labs.computer_lab: State-of-the-art computer lab with high-speed internet and latest software.
labs.language_lab: Interactive learning space to improve communication skills and pronunciation.

infrastructure.transport: Safe and well-maintained fleet of buses covering major routes in and around Kottayam.
infrastructure.sports_facilities: Playground, basketball and badminton courts, indoor games, and fitness training zones.

academics.curriculum: Follows the CBSE syllabus with an integrated approach to academics and co-curricular activities.

events.sports_day: Track and field events to promote fitness and teamwork.
events.arts_fest: Inter-house competitions in music, dance, and theatre.
events.founders_day: Celebration honoring the legacy of Mar Baselios.

admissions.criteria: Admission is open to all irrespective of caste, creed, or religion, based on merit and seat availability.
admissions.procedure: Parents can collect admission forms from the school office or apply online through the website.

contact.address: Mar Baselios Public School, Kottayam, Kerala, 686001
